wehkamp | Cloud Engineer | Zwolle, Netherlands | ONSITE

Wehkamp is one of the oldest players in the online retail market in The Netherlands. Our catalog contains lots of fashion items, but we also sell consoles and even furniture. Everyone knows our brand.

Our microservices and microsites are hosted on Mesos (AWS) and we have been running docker in production for over 2 years. The tech-stack is able to host Java, Scala, DotNetCore and Node applications with ease. Prometheus metrics are everywhere - something the SRE team is extremely happy with.

We're looking for passionate engineers who feel at home around microservices, deployment pipelines, immutability and infrastructure-as-code and who feel comfortable talking Python and Bash. Or ones that simply want to join us on our adventures :)

Interested? Reach out at: aHdlaXRlc0B3ZWhrYW1wLm5sCg==
